```{r}
library(HistData)

```
```{r}

filtered_data <- subset(Breslau, age >= 5)

kable(filtered_data,caption = "Filtered Breslau Data (Age â‰¥ 5)")
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-death

     xlab = "Age at Death",
     ylab = "Total Deaths")
grid()
```
